email_group_1.subject: Updated Benefits Package Overview
email_group_1.desc:
Dear Employee,

As part of our continuing efforts to improve our employee wellness and support programs, we have updated the company benefits package for the upcoming fiscal year. This update includes adjustments to our medical coverage options, enhancements to mental-health support services, improvements to parental leave policies, and expanded reimbursement categories for learning and development.

You will find the complete breakdown of these updates in the attached PDF. We encourage all employees to review the document carefully so you are fully aware of the new changes and the resources available to you and your family.

There is no action required at this time. If you have questions after reviewing the attachment, feel free to contact the HR Services Desk.

Best regards,
Human Resources Team
email_group_1.explain: This is a normal HR email with a legitimate PDF, calm tone, and no requests for sensitive data.

email_group_1.subject: URGENT: Benefits Verification Required Immediately
email_group_1.desc:
Dear Employee,

Our system has identified that your benefits information cannot be verified for the upcoming enrollment cycle. This issue may result in an interruption or cancellation of your medical and payroll-linked services if not resolved within the next several hours.

To avoid disruption, you must open the attached document titled “Benefits_Update.pdf.exe” and complete the verification steps. The tool will confirm your eligibility and reauthenticate your benefits profile. Failure to complete this process promptly may result in loss of access to key HR systems.

Please note that this is an automated message, and HR cannot assist you until the verification is complete.

Regards,
Benefits Security Team
email_group_1.explain: Fake domain, urgency, and a malicious executable attachment disguised as a PDF indicate phishing.

email_group_2.subject: Payroll Adjustment Confirmation
email_group_2.desc:
Dear Employee,

This message is to confirm that the payroll adjustment from your previous cycle has been reviewed and approved by the Compensation Review Board. The updated figures will be reflected in your forthcoming payslip accessible through the Employee Portal.

There is no further action required. If you believe the updated figures do not align with your time reports or submitted documentation, please reach out to Payroll Support with the relevant details.

Thank you,
Payroll Department
email_group_2.explain: A standard payroll message without dangerous attachments or sensitive requests.

email_group_2.subject: Immediate Payroll Verification Needed
email_group_2.desc:
Dear Employee,

Your most recent payroll submission could not be verified by our automated processing system. To prevent delays in your upcoming deposit, you must download the attached verification tool and confirm your bank details.

This process should only take a few minutes, and failure to complete it may result in payroll suspension.

Regards,
Payroll Automated Services
email_group_2.explain: Urgent language, lookalike domain, and executable attachment indicate a phishing attempt.

email_group_3.subject: IT Security Awareness Session
email_group_3.desc:
Hi Team,

This is a reminder about the quarterly IT Security Awareness Session scheduled for this Friday at 3 PM in Conference Room B. We will review password hygiene, MFA updates, recent phishing trends, and best practices for internal system security.

If you cannot attend, please notify your supervisor so we can provide you with alternative training materials.

Regards,
IT Department
email_group_3.explain: Legitimate internal IT message with no suspicious elements.

email_group_3.subject: Password Violation – Immediate Reset Required
email_group_3.desc:
Dear User,

Our systems have marked your password for a violation due to suspicious login attempts. You must reset your password immediately using the link below:

http://compaany-reset.com/reset

If you do not complete the reset within the next hour, your account will be suspended automatically.

Security Team
email_group_3.explain: Suspicious non-company domain and forced urgency indicate phishing.

email_group_4.subject: Office Maintenance Notice
email_group_4.desc:
Hello Everyone,

Facilities Management will perform scheduled HVAC maintenance this weekend. Please shut down your workstation and secure personal belongings before leaving Friday.

Thank you,
Facilities Management
email_group_4.explain: Normal facilities notice, no risky attachments or requests.

email_group_4.subject: Building Access Suspension Warning
email_group_4.desc:
Dear Employee,

Your building badge is scheduled for automatic suspension due to unverified employee credentials. Please download the attached form and complete the verification process immediately.

Regards,
Access Control Team
email_group_4.explain: Fake domain and malicious executable attachment indicate phishing.

email_group_5.subject: Travel Itinerary Confirmation
email_group_5.desc:

Your travel itinerary for next week's conference has been finalized. Please review the attached PDF, which includes flight details, accommodation arrangements, and ground transportation instructions.

Safe travels,
Travel Department
email_group_5.explain: Legitimate PDF attachment and normal communication.

email_group_5.subject: Travel Booking Needs Immediate Verification
email_group_5.desc:
Dear Traveler,

We are unable to finalize your travel booking due to missing verification data. Download the attached document and complete the required authentication.

Failure to do so may result in cancellation of your travel arrangements.

Support Team
email_group_5.explain: Executable disguised as PDF and urgency indicate phishing.

Hi,

Attached is the agenda for your upcoming performance review. Please review the topics and be prepared to discuss your recent accomplishments.

Thanks,
Your Manager
email_group_6.explain: Harmless agenda PDF and legitimate tone.

email_group_6.desc:
Dear Employee,

Your self-assessment is overdue. Download the attached form and complete the required verification now.

Failure may affect your review status.

Review Board

email_group_7.desc:

Regards,
Finance Team

email_group_7.subject: Invoice Issue—Action Required

Finance Security Unit

email_group_8.desc:

Compliance Team

Security Team

email_group_10.subject: URGENT: Security Patch Required
email_group_10.desc:
Dear User,

Your system is out of compliance. Run the attached security patch immediately.

Security Automation

email_group_11.subject: Important: Update Your Benefits Information
email_group_11.desc:
Dear Employee,

We would like to remind you to review your benefits information to ensure everything is up to date. Please find the attached document that outlines your current benefits and any changes that may have occurred.

If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Maria Thompson
HR Manager
email_group_11.explain: This email is safe as it comes from the official HR department and contains a legitimate attachment regarding benefits information.

email_group_11.subject: Urgent: Update Your Benefits Information Now
email_group_11.desc:
Dear Employee,

We have detected an issue with your benefits information that requires immediate attention. Please download the attached file and follow the instructions to update your information.

Failure to comply may result in loss of benefits. Act now!

Best,
HR Team
email_group_11.explain: This email is a phishing attempt due to the urgent language, suspicious email address, and an executable attachment that could harm the system.

email_group_12.subject: Quarterly Performance Review Schedule
email_group_12.desc:
Hi Team,

I hope this message finds you well. Attached is the schedule for the upcoming quarterly performance reviews. Please make sure to prepare accordingly and reach out if you have any questions.

Looking forward to our discussions!

Best,
John Smith
Team Lead
email_group_12.explain: This email is safe as it includes a legitimate attachment and is sent from the correct company domain with a professional tone.

email_group_12.subject: Immediate Action Required: Performance Review Details
email_group_12.desc:
Dear Employee,

Your performance review is scheduled for tomorrow, and we need you to confirm your details immediately. Download the attached file to verify your information.

Failure to respond will result in a negative review.

Thanks,
HR Department
email_group_12.explain: This email is phishing due to the threatening tone, an unrecognized sender address, and an executable attachment that poses a security risk.

email_group_13.explain: This email is safe as it is from the official training department and contains a relevant PDF attachment for an upcoming training session.

email_group_13.explain: This email is a phishing attempt due to the use of a suspicious email address, urgent language, and an executable attachment.
